coreAttributes.name: No fetishes
coreAttributes.description: Removes all fetishes and sets desire level to neutral.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_ANAL_GIVING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_ANAL_RECEIVING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_VAGINAL_GIVING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_VAGINAL_RECEIVING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_ORAL_RECEIVING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_ORAL_GIVING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_BREASTS_OTHERS)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_BREASTS_SELF)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_LACTATION_OTHERS)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_LACTATION_SELF)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_LEG_LOVER)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_STRUTTER)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_FOOT_GIVING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_FOOT_RECEIVING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_PENIS_RECEIVING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_PENIS_GIVING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_CUM_STUD)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_CUM_ADDICT)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_DEFLOWERING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_PURE_VIRGIN)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_MASTURBATION)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_PREGNANCY)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_IMPREGNATION)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_TRANSFORMATION_GIVING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_TRANSFORMATION_RECEIVING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_KINK_GIVING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_KINK_RECEIVING)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_DENIAL)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_DENIAL_SELF)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_DOMINANT)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_SUBMISSIVE)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_INCEST)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_MASOCHIST)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_SADIST)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_NON_CON_DOM)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_NON_CON_SUB)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_EXHIBITIONIST)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_VOYEURIST)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_BIMBO)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_CROSS_DRESSER)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_SIZE_QUEEN)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_SWITCH)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_BREEDER)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_SADOMASOCHIST)] [#npc.removeFetish(FETISH_LUSTY_MAIDEN)]

[#npc.setFetishDesire(FETISH_ANAL_GIVING, FETISH_DESIRE_TWO_NEUTRAL, true)] [#npc.setFetishDesire(FETISH_ANAL_RECEIVING, FETISH_DESIRE_TWO_NEUTRAL, true)] [#npc.setFetishDesire(FETISH_VAGINAL_GIVING,
